title: Introducing: LIKHA
content:
There’s a real 00’s garage feel to the beat on this debut track from LIKHA (Australia’s Carly Bettinson).

Bold, energetic synth pop, combining an almost house-esque chorus hook, it’s an ambitious and addictive first offering. Check out Buzz below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
